insert.foreach: insert into role_permission(`role_id`, `class_id`, `operation`, `create_time`, `update_time`) values (#{roleId}, #{classId}, #{operation}, now(), now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE role_id = #{roleId}, class_id=#{classId}, operation=#{operation}, create_time=now(), update_time=now()

mapper.select: select distinct(ur.user_id) as userId, up.sgname as userSgname from user_role ur left join role_permission p on ur.role_id=p.role_id left join user_profile up on ur.user_id=up.user_id where p.operation = #{operation} and p.class_id=#{classId}
